name: smartthings-smartapp
description: JavaScript/TypeScript library for using SmartThings APIs
author: Joseph M. Deming

scripts.inst: concurrently -n "client:install,server:install" -c "red,magenta" "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.build: concurrently -n "server:build,client:build" -c "red,magenta" "cd server && npm run build" "cd client && npm run build"
scripts.lint: concurrently -n "client:lint,server:lint" -c "white,gray" "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "server:tunnel,server:host,client:start" -c "blue,cyan,green" "cd server && npm run tunnel" "cd server && npm run start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.kill-client: npx --no -p killport -p dotenv-cli -p cross-replace -c "dotenv -e client/.env -- cross-replace kill-port %SMARTAPP_WEBHARNESS_PORT%"
scripts.kill-server: npx --no -p killport -p dotenv-cli -p cross-replace -c "dotenv -e server/.env -- cross-replace kill-port %STPORT%"
